short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 🐾 Welcome to your new productivity companion, Firu! 🚀

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online time with our Chrome extension designed to track your web activity and boost productivity. 🕒

With Firu by your side, your browsing experience becomes personalized and more enjoyable. 🐶

✨ Features and Benefits ✨

📅 Time Tracking: Keep tabs on how you spend your time online, helping you stay mindful and focused.

🎯 Productivity Boost: Firu encourages you to stay on task, making productivity a breeze.

🌟 Personalized Experience: Say goodbye to generic trackers. Firu adds a touch of fun and personality to your productivity journey.

📊 Data Insights: View detailed stats for different days or date ranges, helping you identify patterns and optimize your routine.

🏆 Productivity Score: Instantly see how you're performing with our productivity score, giving you a quick overview of your progress.

Download now and let Firu transform your online experience into one that's productive, personalized, and paws-itively delightful! 🐾

🥒 Created by Pepino Project. Contact us at projectpepino@gmail.com for support and inquiries.
